I'm a UX Designer

I specialise in Information architecture, designing interactions and UI concepts.

UX work

REI Explorer

This project included a complex information architecture and interaction design, building a website that pushes people to enjoy the great outdoors and increases purchases through REI.

Role: Research, design and user testing Tools: Sketch, inVision, Paper iPad app
